text:
In catalina.sh the kill direct after the call to org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap should be kill -15 and not kill -0. As it is now the process isn't termed.

Met vriendelijke groet,

Gerard Borst
creator: gerard-borst@hotmail.com

text:
kill -0 (aka null signal) is used to test the validity of process id.
The kill utility just does the check - no signal is actually send.
This is as intended.
